snippet: WEISS--Carol, 81, passed away peacefully in her home on July 15, 2016 surrounded by her beloved and adoring daughters Sydney (Susan) and Emily. She was a loving grandmother to Hunter and Stephanie and greatly loved her son-in-law Mark. She will be...
lead_paragraph: WEISS--Carol, 81, passed away peacefully in her home on July 15, 2016 surrounded by her beloved and adoring daughters Sydney (Susan) and Emily. She was a loving grandmother to Hunter and Stephanie and greatly loved her son-in-law Mark. She will be deeply missed by family and her many friends. 1/3
